text: وفى عاد اذ ارسلنا عليهم الريح العقيم

translations.translation: And also in 'Ad when We unleashed against them the barren wind,
In 'Ad (also is a sign), when We sent a blasting wind against them,
There is also a Sign for you in (the story of) Ad, when We let loose upon them an ominous wind
There is also evidence of the Truth in the story of Ad whom We struck with a violent wind
And in the tribe of A’ad, when we sent a dry windstorm upon them.
And in `Ad when We sent against them the barren wind;
And in Ad: When We sent upon them the destructive wind.
And also in Ad, when We loosed against them the withering wind
And in (the tribe of) A'ad (there is a portent) when we sent the fatal wind against them.
There is another sign in the [tribe of] 'Ad, when We sent against them a life-destroying wind
And in `A-ad also was a lesson, when We sent against them the barren wind.
And in ‘Ad when We unleashed upon them a barren wind.
And in the 'Ad (people) (was another Sign): Behold, We sent against them the devastating Wind:
And in 'Ad (there is also a sign) when We sent against them the barren wind;
And in Aad. We let loose on them a withering wind
And in Aad. We unleashed against them the devastating wind.
And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

[51:41] And [also] in, the destruction of, ‘Ād, was a sign, when We unleashed against them a barren wind, [a wind] which brings nothing of good, for it does not bear any rain and does not pollinate any trees; this [wind] was the west wind (al-dabūr).

(And in (the tribe of) 'Aad) the people of Hud ((there is a portent) when We sent) We set on them (the fatal wind against them) the severe wind in which there was no comfort for them, this is the west wind.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ } معناه التي لا تُلقِّحُ

translations.translation: And His saying, "We sent against them the barren wind" - meaning the wind that does not give life.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } تركنا أيضاً آية عظيمة للمعتبرين { فِي } إهلاك قوم { عَادٍ } اذكر { إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا } وسلطنا { عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ } [الذاريات: 41] لا يثمر نفعاً سوى العقم والهلاك على وجه الاستئصال
 مع أنهم أملوا نفعاً عظيماً فيها
